target.name: downloadTIGR
target.description: Downloads files for TIGR to staging area.

target.name: assembleTIGR
target.description: Assembles files for TIGR into fasta files in the staging area.

target.name: convertTIGR
target.description: Converts FASTA files for TIGR into blastable files in the staging area.

target.name: pushTIGR
target.description: Pushes blast files for TIGR to production from the staging area.

target.name: revertTIGR
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the staging area.
